      • ChangeFilePath

        public void ChangeFilePath(String directory,
                  String filename)
                    throws IOException
        Change the file that the log will be written to. If the logger is already running, then that logger will stop writing and write what's left in queuing in the new file.
        Parameters:
        directory -
        filename -
        Throws:
        IOException
